it.unica.enotes
Class NoteAttachment

java.lang.Object
  it.unica.enotes.NoteAttachment

public class NoteAttachment
extends Object

Represents an attachment to a note

Author:
Emanuele Alimonda, Giovanni Serra

                      int filetype,
                      String filename,
                      String filedata)

filetype - The file type ID
filename - The file's name
filedata - The file contents, with base64 encoding
